name: Clong (woofenator)
description:
A pong clone made in Godot.

Press space to start the game, paddles are controlled with W/S or Up/Down for Left or Right paddle respectively.

Ball speeds up by 10% every time it hits a paddle and resets to the middle on going off-screen, with the first hit belonging to the side that scored. There is no end, the score will continue building up forever
